title: Quote Buddy
description: A fun uplifting app that reads inspirational quotes outloud ot you in multiple different voices. Utilizes multiple API calls to pull a random quote, and then gives the user the option to have it read out loud with one of 9 voices.
tech: HTML, CSS with Pure framework, JavaSCript, JQuery, Forismatic Quote API, and Voice RSS Text to Speach API.

title: Team Manager Database
description: Add and delete employees from the team manager database.  Utilizes multiple mySQL tables to create an extensive team mangement application.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather forcasting app.  The app utilizes API calls from open weather api and gives a 5 day forcast. As well as saves past searches to local storage so you can access them again later.
tech: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Open Weather API, and Local Storage

title: Watercooler
description: Now that everyone is working from home, it's hard to have those small conversations aroung the watercooler.  This MERN application utilizes a Mongo database to store comments, a firebase database to store user login info, and a React front end to create a seameless app for conversing with your co-workers.
tech: React, Firebase, MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js, and Material UI

title: Daily Planner
description: A helpful daily planner you can use to plan out your daily activities.  Tasks can be saved or deleted from local storage so you can come back later to check things off your to do list.  The formatting also changes by the hour to show the passage of time.

title: Burger Battle
description: Need to decide once and for all who has the best burger in town? Burger Battle is here to settle the debate.  Add your favorite burger place to the Battle. Burger Battle utilizes a Mongo Data base so users can submit their favorite burger places, and vote for their best spot.  Comment section coming soon.
tech: HTML, CSS, MySQL, Bootstrap, JavaScript, JQuery, Sequelize, Express, and Node.js

title: Budget Tracker PWA
description: A budget tracking app that functions as a progressive web app.  So you can track your budget on the go with or without an internet connection.
tech: JavaScript, Manifest.json, Local Storage, Indexed DB, and Service Worker
